price: 42. Ce jour-là, ceux qui ont mécru et ont désobéi au Messager souhaiteront disparaître sous terre et ils ne sauront rien taire à Allah de ce qu’ils ont dit.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَعَصَوُاْ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَوۡ تُسَوَّىٰ بِهِمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَلَا يَكۡتُمُونَ ٱللَّهَ حَدِيثٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yawaddu alladhīna kafarū waʿaṣawū al-rasūla law tusawwā bihimu al-arḍu walā yaktumūna al-laha ḥadīthan
